air-air.label: Air × Air
air-air.summary_line: A meeting of minds — communicative, curious, and light-hearted.
air-air.expanded: Two Air signs fall in love with ideas and shared freedom. Conversation flows, friendship anchors the romance, and optimism keeps you exploring. Depth grows when you pause to feel as much as you think.

fire-fire.label: Fire × Fire
fire-fire.summary_line: Two flames burning bright — passionate, inspiring, and bold.
fire-fire.expanded: This is ignition energy. You motivate each other, dream loudly, and move fast. Greatness comes when you aim the blaze together and honor turn-taking.
fire-fire.nurture: Celebrate wins; channel drive into shared aims.

earth-earth.label: Earth × Earth
earth-earth.summary_line: Grounded and practical — slow-built security and trust.
earth-earth.expanded: Stability is your love language. You value reliability, rituals, and tangible progress. Make room for novelty so comfort stays alive.

water-water.label: Water × Water
water-water.summary_line: Deep emotional flow — intuitive and nurturing.
water-water.expanded: You feel first and speak second. The bond is soulful and protective. Name feelings clearly so sensitivity becomes intimacy, not overwhelm.
water-water.nurture: Gentle honesty, cozy time, creative outlets.
water-water.caution: Mood spirals — name feelings, not just vibes.

air-fire.label: Air × Fire
air-fire.summary_line: Air fuels Fire — vibrant, creative, full of motion.
air-fire.expanded: One brings momentum, the other perspective. Together you spark courage and possibility. Keep focus so brilliance finishes what it starts.
air-fire.caution: Scattered focus; finish what you start.

fire-air.label: Fire × Air
fire-air.summary_line: Air fuels Fire — vibrant, creative, full of motion.
fire-air.expanded: One brings momentum, the other perspective. Together you spark courage and possibility. Keep focus so brilliance finishes what it starts.
fire-air.caution: Scattered focus; finish what you start.

earth-water.label: Earth × Water
earth-water.summary_line: Water nourishes Earth — stable, tender, growth-oriented.
earth-water.expanded: Practical care meets emotional depth. You create a dependable home for feelings and plans to flourish.
earth-water.nurture: Home projects, shared care, steady dates.

water-earth.label: Water × Earth
water-earth.summary_line: Water nourishes Earth — stable, tender, growth-oriented.
water-earth.expanded: Practical care meets emotional depth. You create a dependable home for feelings and plans to flourish.
water-earth.nurture: Home projects, shared care, steady dates.

fire-water.label: Fire × Water
fire-water.summary_line: Steam and storm — intense attraction but turbulent emotions.
fire-water.expanded: Magnetic, moody, unforgettable. Learn to cool and soothe after conflict so passion becomes devotion, not drama.

water-fire.label: Water × Fire
water-fire.summary_line: Steam and storm — intense attraction but turbulent emotions.
water-fire.expanded: Magnetic, moody, unforgettable. Learn to cool and soothe after conflict so passion becomes devotion, not drama.

air-earth.label: Air × Earth
air-earth.summary_line: Different speeds — one seeks change, the other stability.
air-earth.expanded: Curiosity meets caution. The pairing grows when plans have play built in and spontaneity respects structure.
air-earth.nurture: Clear plans with room for play.
air-earth.caution: Critic vs dreamer dynamic; trade lenses.

earth-air.label: Earth × Air
earth-air.summary_line: Different speeds — one seeks change, the other stability.
earth-air.expanded: Curiosity meets caution. The pairing grows when plans have play built in and spontaneity respects structure.
earth-air.nurture: Clear plans with room for play.
earth-air.caution: Critic vs dreamer dynamic; trade lenses.

earth-fire.label: Earth × Fire
earth-fire.summary_line: Fire's enthusiasm can warm Earth's steadiness — with respect and timing.
earth-fire.expanded: Inspiration meets implementation. Agree on pace and milestones so the spark turns into something built to last.
earth-fire.nurture: Aim the fire at practical milestones.
earth-fire.caution: Impatience vs caution; set pace rules.

fire-earth.label: Fire × Earth
fire-earth.summary_line: Fire's enthusiasm can warm Earth's steadiness — with respect and timing.
fire-earth.expanded: Inspiration meets implementation. Agree on pace and milestones so the spark turns into something built to last.
fire-earth.nurture: Aim the fire at practical milestones.
fire-earth.caution: Impatience vs caution; set pace rules.

air-water.label: Air × Water
air-water.summary_line: Mind meets emotion — fascinating if communication stays gentle.
air-water.expanded: Ideas need feelings and feelings need words. This match shines with empathy and reflective listening.

water-air.label: Water × Air
water-air.summary_line: Mind meets emotion — fascinating if communication stays gentle.
water-air.expanded: Ideas need feelings and feelings need words. This match shines with empathy and reflective listening.
